duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain Salesforce applications with CPQ functionalities to support business processes.
Utilize SOAP/REST APIs to develop and consume integrations with external systems.
Work with a collaborative team in an Agile development environment to resolve tickets and backlog items.
Apply expertise in sales processes to optimize Lead to Opportunity close.
Design and develop backend webservice solutions and community portal development.
Provide elegant and effective solutions to achieve business objectives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
